posts.title: Updated Data Loading Code & Changed News Meta
posts.details: I've made some small changes to reduce the amount of lines the code uses. I also decided to let the projects and userscripts be sorted alphabetically. With the change to the Reddit userscript I no longer needed to change the word "and" to an ampersand. I also have it changing Gmail to GMail because that's how I prefer to stylize it even if Gmail is the correct way. I also changed the news json file's meta section to be more word based rather than fully numeric.

posts.title: Updated "Grab Palette" Again
posts.details: I have improved the sorting for the "Grab Palette" project. Still not perfect but it is definitely better.

posts.title: Updated Projects/UserScripts List Code
posts.details: I removed the archive check as I am not keeping anything in an archive. I also updated the capitalization fixing stuff.

posts.title: News Script Updated
posts.details: I have updated the news script to allow me to include double quotes in the posts while also using my automatic formatter.

posts.title: Updated "Grab Palette"
posts.details: I changed my "Grab Palette" script to be a little more efficient.

posts.title: Small Changes
posts.details: The font is now sans-serif which I think looks nicer, and projects will now indicate if they are archived or not.

posts.title: News Page Now Is Also Seperated From The HTML
posts.details: Following suit (kind of) with the other two pages the news page is also no longer updated directly from the HTML file.

posts.title: Projects & Userscripts Page Upgrade + Better Page Layout
posts.details: As the title lays out pretty clearly. I have upgraded the projects and userscripts pages to automatically update whenever I upload or create or whatever a new one automatically. I also made it so that should a section ever have too much to fit it no longer scrolls the whole page and only the content. An oversight I didn't realize was there as I didn't properly test it and it only came to my attention now with testing out the upgraded sections for the projects and userscripts pages.

posts.title: New Userscripts Page
posts.details: Added new page for userscripts I have developed.

posts.title: Initial Design & Content Up
posts.details: The new homepage has been put up.
